name: Avatar Flight of Passage
theme: Ride a banshee through the floating mountains and bioluminescent forests of Pandora in this breathtaking 3D flight simulator.
short_description: An immersive 3D flight simulator soaring on a banshee over the world of Pandora.

name: Na'vi River Journey
theme: A gentle boat journey through a bioluminescent rainforest on Pandora culminating in a Na'vi shaman encounter.
short_description: A peaceful boat ride through the glowing forests of Pandora with stunning visuals.

name: Expedition Everest – Legend of the Forbidden Mountain
theme: A high-speed train journey through the Himalayas with an encounter with the mythical Yeti and backward sections.
short_description: A thrilling roller coaster through Mount Everest with forward and backward segments.

name: Kilimanjaro Safaris
theme: An open-air safari vehicle tour through African savannas encountering live animals like lions, elephants, giraffes, and more.
short_description: A safari adventure through 110 acres viewing real African wildlife.

name: Kali River Rapids
theme: A whitewater raft adventure down a raging river with environmental conservation themes—you will get soaked!
short_description: A thrilling river rapids ride through the rainforests of Asia.

name: DINOSAUR
theme: A time-traveling EMV dark ride racing through the Cretaceous Period dodging dinosaurs before the meteor strike.
short_description: A thrilling time-travel adventure encountering realistic dinosaurs in the prehistoric past.

name: It's Tough to be a Bug!
theme: A 3D film featuring Flik from A Bug's Life with in-theater effects celebrating the insect world.
short_description: A humorous 3D show with sensory effects exploring life as a bug.

name: Festival of the Lion King
theme: A Broadway-caliber theatrical celebration of The Lion King with acrobats, dancers, singers, and puppetry.
short_description: A high-energy musical stage show celebrating The Lion King with live performers.

name: Finding Nemo: The Big Blue... and Beyond!
theme: A theatrical musical retelling the story of Finding Nemo and Finding Dory with puppets, singing, and dance.
short_description: A charming stage musical featuring songs and puppetry from Finding Nemo and Dory.

name: Feathered Friends in Flight!
theme: An outdoor amphitheater show featuring live exotic birds demonstrating natural behaviors.
short_description: A live bird show showcasing the beauty and abilities of exotic birds.

name: Gorilla Falls Exploration Trail
theme: A self-guided walking trail through African habitats viewing gorillas, hippos, birds, and other wildlife.
short_description: A scenic walking path through lush habitats with close views of African animals.

name: Maharajah Jungle Trek
theme: A self-guided trail through Southeast Asian habitats viewing tigers, Komodo dragons, bats, and exotic birds.
short_description: A walking path through Asian ruins and forests with close-up animal encounters.

name: Wildlife Express Train
theme: A scenic train ride from Africa to Rafiki's Planet Watch with views of backstage animal care areas.
short_description: A train journey offering behind-the-scenes glimpses of animal habitats.

name: Rafiki's Planet Watch
theme: An interactive conservation station with animal care facilities, petting zoo, and educational exhibits.
short_description: A behind-the-scenes look at animal care with interactive conservation experiences.

name: TriceraTop Spin
theme: A Dumbo-style spinner ride aboard flying dinosaurs with guest-controlled height.
short_description: A gentle spinning ride for young guests aboard colorful dinosaurs.

name: Primeval Whirl (Permanently Closed)
theme: A spinning wild mouse coaster through a time-travel carnival with sharp turns and sudden drops.
short_description: A spinning family coaster themed to time travel—now permanently closed.

name: The Boneyard
theme: An archaeological dig site playground where kids can dig for dinosaur bones and explore fossil exhibits.
short_description: An interactive playground themed to a paleontological dig site.

name: Tree of Life
theme: The park's iconic 145-foot baobab tree with over 300 animal carvings, viewable on walking paths.
short_description: Animal Kingdom's iconic centerpiece with intricate animal carvings covering the trunk.

name: Discovery Island Trails
theme: Scenic walking paths around Discovery Island with animal habitats featuring kangaroos, lemurs, and exotic birds.
short_description: Tranquil pathways with animal encounters around the Tree of Life.

name: Rivers of Light (Retired)
theme: A nighttime water and light show celebrating nature with floating lanterns, projections, and music.
short_description: A peaceful nighttime spectacular on Discovery River—no longer running regularly.

name: Tree of Life Awakenings
theme: Nighttime projection shows on the Tree of Life bringing animal stories to life with magical visuals and music.
short_description: Enchanting projection shows animating the Tree of Life after dark.

name: Guardians of the Galaxy – Mission: BREAKOUT!
theme: Help Rocket rescue the Guardians from the Collector's fortress with randomized drop sequences and rock music.
short_description: A thrilling drop tower experience set in the Guardians of the Galaxy universe.

name: Incredicoaster
theme: Race alongside the Incredibles family to catch Jack-Jack on this high-speed launched coaster.
short_description: A thrilling launched roller coaster themed to The Incredibles on Pixar Pier.

name: Radiator Springs Racers
theme: A scenic journey through Radiator Springs followed by a high-speed race through Ornament Valley.
short_description: An immersive Cars-themed dark ride culminating in a thrilling side-by-side race.

name: WEB SLINGERS: A Spider-Man Adventure
theme: Help Spider-Man capture Spider-Bots using web-slinging hand gestures in this interactive 3D attraction.
short_description: An interactive dark ride where guests use hand motions to sling webs like Spider-Man.

name: Soarin' Around the World
theme: Hang glide over iconic landmarks around the world in this breathtaking flight simulator experience.
short_description: A peaceful flying simulator soaring over global landmarks with sweeping visuals.

name: Grizzly River Run
theme: Navigate the rapids of the Sierra Nevada wilderness on this spinning raft adventure—you will get wet!
short_description: A thrilling white-water raft ride through the California wilderness.

name: Toy Story Midway Mania!
theme: Play carnival games hosted by Toy Story characters using 3D glasses and spring-action shooters.
short_description: An interactive 4D carnival game dark ride with Woody, Buzz, and friends.

name: Monsters, Inc. Mike & Sulley to the Rescue!
theme: A taxi ride through Monstropolis as Mike and Sulley try to get Boo home safely.
short_description: A family-friendly dark ride through scenes from Monsters, Inc.

name: Inside Out Emotional Whirlwind
theme: Spin around inside Riley's mind aboard memory orbs with the emotions from Inside Out.
short_description: A colorful spinner ride themed to the emotions from Inside Out.

name: Jessie's Critter Carousel
theme: A carousel featuring woodland critters from Woody's Roundup.
short_description: A whimsical carousel with animal characters from Toy Story 2.

name: Silly Symphony Swings
theme: A classic wave swinger ride themed to vintage Disney animation shorts.
short_description: A swinging chair ride high above Pixar Pier with bay views.

name: Goofy's Sky School
theme: Learn to fly with Goofy on this wild spinning and swooping roller coaster.
short_description: A spinning family coaster featuring Goofy as a flight instructor.

name: The Little Mermaid ~ Ariel's Undersea Adventure
theme: Journey under the sea and experience Ariel's story with classic songs and colorful animatronics.
short_description: A family-friendly dark ride retelling the story of The Little Mermaid.

name: Golden Zephyr
theme: Fly around in retro-futuristic rocket ships suspended from a central tower.
short_description: A classic spinning rocket ride inspired by 1920s sci-fi design.

name: Jumpin' Jellyfish
theme: Bounce up and down beneath colorful jellyfish canopies.
short_description: A gentle up-and-down tower ride designed for younger guests.

name: Mickey's PhilharMagic
theme: A 3D concert film featuring Donald Duck and classic Disney songs with in-theater effects.
short_description: An immersive 3D musical journey through beloved Disney animated classics.

name: Animation Academy
theme: Learn to draw Disney characters with step-by-step instruction from a Disney artist.
short_description: An interactive drawing class where guests learn to sketch Disney characters.

name: Turtle Talk with Crush
theme: A real-time interactive conversation with Crush the sea turtle from Finding Nemo.
short_description: An interactive show where guests chat with Crush in real time.

name: Luigi's Rollickin' Roadsters
theme: Dance along with Luigi's cousins in synchronized trackless cars at Casa Della Tires.
short_description: A fun trackless ride where cars dance to Italian music in Cars Land.

name: Mater's Junkyard Jamboree
theme: Swing and whip around in baby tractors towed by Mater to country music.
short_description: A whip ride where tractors swing around Mater's junkyard dance party.

name: Redwood Creek Challenge Trail
theme: An outdoor adventure playground with slides, rope bridges, and climbing challenges in a forest setting.
short_description: An interactive wilderness playground inspired by California's redwood forests.

name: World of Color
theme: A breathtaking nighttime water and light show featuring Disney stories, fountains, lasers and projections.
short_description: DCA's signature nighttime spectacular combining water screens, projections, and music.

name: World of Color – ONE
theme: A celebration of 100 years of Disney storytelling with water, projections, and music honoring Walt Disney.
short_description: An updated World of Color show celebrating Disney's centennial.

name: Disney Junior Dance Party!
theme: An interactive live show where kids dance and play with Disney Junior characters.
short_description: A high-energy dance party featuring popular Disney Junior characters.

name: Frozen – Live at the Hyperion
theme: A Broadway-style stage adaptation of Disney's Frozen with live singing, elaborate sets, and special effects.
short_description: A full-scale theatrical production of Frozen with professional performers.

name: Avengers Assemble! A Spectacular with Doctor Strange
theme: Watch the Avengers battle evil with stunts, projections, and special effects featuring Doctor Strange.
short_description: An action-packed live stunt show featuring Marvel superheroes.

name: Pixar Pal-A-Round
theme: A giant Ferris wheel with stationary and swinging gondolas featuring Pixar characters.
short_description: An iconic Ferris wheel offering sweeping park views—choose swinging or non-swinging.

name: Big Thunder Mountain
theme: Race through a gold mining town on a runaway mine train with an underwater tunnel finale.
short_description: A thrilling mine train coaster on an island surrounded by Rivers of the Far West.

name: Phantom Manor
theme: Explore a gothic Victorian mansion haunted by the Phantom and his tragic bride in this darker Haunted Mansion.
short_description: A spooky dark ride through a haunted manor with a unique European twist.

name: Pirates of the Caribbean
theme: Sail through pirate-infested Caribbean waters featuring Captain Jack Sparrow and Audio-Animatronics.
short_description: A boat ride through pirate adventures with multiple drops and elaborate scenes.

name: Indiana Jones and the Temple of Peril
theme: Race through ancient ruins on a runaway mine cart featuring a 360-degree loop.
short_description: An intense outdoor looping coaster through an archaeological dig site.

name: Star Wars Hyperspace Mountain
theme: Join the Rebel Alliance in a high-speed battle through space with inversions and on-board audio.
short_description: An intense indoor roller coaster with loops themed to Star Wars space battles.

name: Avengers Assemble: Flight Force
theme: Join Iron Man and Captain Marvel on a high-speed mission featuring inversions and launches.
short_description: A thrilling indoor launched coaster with loops in Avengers Campus.

name: Spider-Man W.E.B. Adventure
theme: Help Spider-Man capture Spider-Bots using web-slinging hand gestures in this interactive 3D attraction.
short_description: An interactive dark ride where guests sling webs with hand motions.

name: Buzz Lightyear Laser Blast
theme: Join Buzz Lightyear to defeat Emperor Zurg by shooting targets with laser cannons.
short_description: An interactive shooting dark ride through space with competitive scoring.

name: Star Tours: The Adventures Continue
theme: A 3D flight simulator with randomized Star Wars adventures across multiple planets.
short_description: A motion simulator journey through Star Wars locations with multiple story paths.

name: Autopia
theme: Drive your own futuristic car along a scenic highway through Discoveryland.
short_description: A guided car ride where guests control gas-powered vehicles on a track.

name: Orbitron
theme: Pilot a rocket ship through the solar system controlling your altitude as you orbit.
short_description: A futuristic spinning rocket ride with guest-controlled height.

name: Peter Pan's Flight
theme: Fly over London and Neverland in pirate galleons suspended from above.
short_description: A classic flying dark ride through the story of Peter Pan.

name: Blanche-Neige et les Sept Nains (Snow White)
theme: Journey through Snow White's tale with the Evil Queen and the Seven Dwarfs.
short_description: A dark ride retelling the classic Snow White fairy tale.

name: Les Voyages de Pinocchio (Pinocchio's Journey)
theme: Follow Pinocchio's adventures from puppet to real boy through Pleasure Island and beyond.
short_description: A charming dark ride through Pinocchio's story.

name: Alice's Curious Labyrinth
theme: Navigate through a hedge maze leading to the Queen of Hearts' castle with interactive surprises.
short_description: A walk-through maze attraction themed to Alice in Wonderland.

name: Mad Hatter's Tea Cups
theme: Spin wildly in oversized teacups at the Mad Hatter's unbirthday party.
short_description: A classic spinning teacup ride from Alice in Wonderland.

name: Dumbo the Flying Elephant
theme: Soar above Fantasyland in Dumbo's flying circus with altitude control.
short_description: A classic flying elephant spinner for all ages.

name: Casey Jr. – le Petit Train du Cirque
theme: Ride aboard Casey Jr. through Storybook Land with miniature scenes from Disney films.
short_description: A scenic train ride through miniature Disney story settings.

name: Le Carrousel de Lancelot
theme: A medieval carousel featuring ornate horses and chariots beneath Sleeping Beauty Castle.
short_description: A beautiful Renaissance-style carousel with hand-carved horses.

name: it's a small world
theme: A boat cruise celebrating cultures worldwide with singing dolls and the iconic theme song.
short_description: A gentle boat ride through scenes of children from around the world.

name: La Tanière du Dragon (Dragon's Lair)
theme: Explore the dungeons beneath Sleeping Beauty Castle and encounter a massive animatronic dragon.
short_description: A walk-through attraction featuring an impressive Audio-Animatronic dragon.

name: Disneyland Railroad
theme: A scenic steam train tour around the entire park with stops in four themed lands.
short_description: A grand circle tour of the park aboard authentic steam locomotives.

name: Main Street Vehicles
theme: Ride vintage turn-of-the-century vehicles down Main Street including horse-drawn streetcars.
short_description: Historic vehicle transportation along Main Street U.S.A.

name: Thunder Mesa Riverboat Landing
theme: Cruise around the Rivers of the Far West on a paddle wheel steamboat.
short_description: A leisurely riverboat voyage around Frontierland's waterways.

name: Pocahontas Indian Village
theme: An interactive playground inspired by Pocahontas with climbing structures and trails.
short_description: A wilderness-themed play area for children.

name: Rustler Roundup Shootin' Gallery
theme: Test your marksmanship at this Old West shooting gallery with moving targets.
short_description: An interactive shooting gallery in a Western town setting.

name: Adventure Isle
theme: Explore caves, suspension bridges, and Captain Hook's pirate ship on a tropical island.
short_description: An interactive island adventure with caves and walkways to explore.

name: La Cabane des Robinson (Swiss Family Treehouse)
theme: Climb through the elaborate treehouse home of the shipwrecked Swiss Family Robinson.
short_description: A walk-through attraction in a massive artificial tree.

name: Disney Illuminations
theme: A nighttime spectacular featuring fireworks, projections, fountains, and lasers on Sleeping Beauty Castle.
short_description: Disneyland Paris' premier nighttime show with castle projections and pyrotechnics.

name: Disney Stars on Parade
theme: A vibrant daytime parade featuring Disney characters on elaborate floats celebrating imagination.
short_description: The park's signature daytime parade with spectacular floats and performers.

name: Mickey and the Magician
theme: A Broadway-style stage show where Mickey learns magic alongside beloved Disney characters.
short_description: A spectacular theatrical production featuring Mickey Mouse and Disney classics.

name: Space Mountain
theme: A high-speed rocket journey through space with sharp turns and sudden drops in complete darkness.
short_description: An indoor roller coaster through the darkness of outer space with thrilling twists and turns.

name: Matterhorn Bobsleds
theme: A bobsled adventure through the icy caverns of the Matterhorn mountain, encountering the Abominable Snowman.
short_description: Disneyland's first roller coaster, racing through the iconic Matterhorn mountain.

name: Pirates of the Caribbean
theme: A boat journey through pirate-infested Caribbean waters featuring Captain Jack Sparrow and swashbuckling adventures.
short_description: The classic dark ride that inspired the film franchise, featuring pirates, treasure, and adventure.

name: Haunted Mansion
theme: A tour through a haunted estate filled with 999 happy haunts, ghosts, and supernatural surprises.
short_description: A spooky-but-fun dark ride through a mansion inhabited by ghosts and ghouls.

name: Indiana Jones Adventure
theme: An archaeological expedition through the Temple of the Forbidden Eye with Dr. Jones, facing ancient traps and dangers.
short_description: A thrilling dark ride adventure through a booby-trapped temple with Indiana Jones.

name: Splash Mountain (Closed for Reimagining)
theme: A log flume journey through the story of Br'er Rabbit, culminating in a five-story splashdown.
short_description: Classic log flume ride being reimagined as Tiana's Bayou Adventure.

name: Big Thunder Mountain Railroad
theme: A runaway mine train racing through the Old West mining town and caverns of Big Thunder Mountain.
short_description: The wildest ride in the wilderness—a runaway mine train roller coaster.

name: It's a Small World
theme: A whimsical boat cruise celebrating children and cultures from around the world with the iconic theme song.
short_description: The classic singing boat ride featuring hundreds of dolls representing global unity.

name: Jungle Cruise
theme: A guided boat tour through exotic jungle rivers with animatronic animals and punny skipper commentary.
short_description: An opening day attraction featuring a humorous boat journey through tropical rivers.

name: Star Tours – The Adventures Continue
theme: A 3D motion simulator flight through the Star Wars galaxy with randomized destinations and adventures.
short_description: A thrilling Star Wars flight simulator with multiple story variations.

name: Star Wars: Rise of the Resistance
theme: An epic multi-stage adventure where guests join the Resistance in a battle against the First Order.
short_description: A groundbreaking attraction blending multiple ride systems in an immersive Star Wars story.

name: Millennium Falcon: Smugglers Run
theme: Pilot the legendary Millennium Falcon on a smuggling mission with interactive controls.
short_description: An interactive flight simulator where guests pilot the Millennium Falcon.

name: Dumbo the Flying Elephant
theme: A spinning ride where guests control their flight height aboard Dumbo flying elephants.
short_description: A classic spinning attraction where families soar on flying elephants.

name: Peter Pan's Flight
theme: A suspended dark ride flying over London and through Neverland with Peter Pan.
short_description: An opening day attraction where guests fly through the story of Peter Pan.

name: Alice in Wonderland
theme: A whimsical dark ride journey through the topsy-turvy world of Wonderland.
short_description: Follow Alice down the rabbit hole in this colorful dark ride adventure.

name: Mad Tea Party
theme: Spinning teacups inspired by the Mad Hatter's tea party scene from Alice in Wonderland.
short_description: An opening day spinning teacup ride based on Alice in Wonderland.

name: Mr. Toad's Wild Ride
theme: A chaotic motorcar ride through J. Thaddeus Toad's reckless adventures from The Wind in the Willows.
short_description: An opening day dark ride featuring a wild journey with Mr. Toad.

name: Casey Jr. Circus Train
theme: A miniature circus train ride through the Storybook Land Canal scenes.
short_description: A gentle train ride offering views of miniature Storybook Land scenes.

name: Storybook Land Canal Boats
theme: A gentle boat cruise through miniature scenes from classic Disney animated films.
short_description: A peaceful canal boat tour showcasing intricate miniature Disney storybook settings.

name: King Arthur Carrousel
theme: A classic carousel featuring hand-painted horses and scenes from Sleeping Beauty.
short_description: An opening day carousel with ornate horses set to Disney music.

name: Snow White's Enchanted Wish
theme: A reimagined dark ride through the story of Snow White with enhanced scenes and effects.
short_description: A refreshed version of the classic Snow White dark ride with improved storytelling.

name: Pinocchio's Daring Journey
theme: A dark ride following Pinocchio's adventures from woodcarver's shop to becoming a real boy.
short_description: A dark ride journey through the story of Pinocchio and his quest to become real.

name: Disneyland Railroad
theme: A grand circle tour of Disneyland aboard vintage steam trains with stations throughout the park.
short_description: An opening day steam train circling the park with stops in multiple lands.

name: Mark Twain Riverboat
theme: A scenic cruise around the Rivers of America aboard an authentic-style paddlewheel riverboat.
short_description: A relaxing riverboat cruise offering views of Frontierland and Tom Sawyer Island.

name: Sailing Ship Columbia
theme: A scenic voyage around the Rivers of America aboard a replica 18th-century sailing ship.
short_description: A majestic sailing ship offering a peaceful cruise with historical maritime theming.

name: Pirate's Lair on Tom Sawyer Island
theme: An island adventure with caves, forts, and pirate-themed exploration areas accessible by raft.
short_description: A self-guided island exploration with caves, bridges, and pirate-themed areas.

name: Autopia
theme: Drive your own car on a guided track through a futuristic highway landscape.
short_description: An opening day attraction where guests drive miniature cars on a guided track.

name: Buzz Lightyear Astro Blasters
theme: An interactive dark ride where guests help Buzz Lightyear defeat Emperor Zurg using laser blasters.
short_description: A family-friendly interactive dark ride where guests score points shooting targets.

name: Finding Nemo Submarine Voyage
theme: A submarine journey through an underwater world searching for Nemo and encountering sea creatures.
short_description: A submarine ride featuring scenes and characters from Finding Nemo.

name: Astro Orbitor
theme: A retro-futuristic spinning rocket ride high above Tomorrowland.
short_description: A spinning attraction where guests pilot rockets around planets above Tomorrowland.

name: Walt Disney's Enchanted Tiki Room
theme: An Audio-Animatronics musical show featuring singing tropical birds, flowers, and tikis.
short_description: A charming indoor show with singing birds and tropical theming.

name: Fantasmic!
theme: A nighttime spectacular featuring Mickey Mouse battling Disney villains with water screens, projections, and pyrotechnics.
short_description: A dazzling nighttime show on the Rivers of America combining water, fire, and Disney magic.

name: Main Street Electrical Parade
theme: An iconic illuminated parade featuring Disney characters on glowing floats with electronic music.
short_description: A legendary nighttime parade with thousands of twinkling lights and classic synthesizer music.

name: Magic Happens Parade
theme: A daytime parade celebrating magical Disney moments with elaborate floats and choreography.
short_description: A modern daytime parade featuring Disney and Pixar characters in stunning theatrical floats.

name: Roger Rabbit's Car Toon Spin
theme: A spinning dark ride through the zany world of Toontown as guests help Roger Rabbit escape the Weasels.
short_description: A whimsical spinning dark ride through chaotic Toontown with Roger Rabbit.

name: Gadget's Go Coaster
theme: A small-scale roller coaster designed by Gadget Hackwrench using household items.
short_description: A kid-friendly roller coaster in Mickey's Toontown with gentle thrills.

name: Mickey's House and Meet Mickey
theme: Walk through Mickey Mouse's home and meet the mouse himself at the end.
short_description: A walkthrough of Mickey's house culminating in a meet-and-greet with Mickey Mouse.

name: Minnie's House
theme: Explore Minnie Mouse's whimsical home with interactive elements throughout.
short_description: A self-guided tour through Minnie's colorful house with fun interactive details.

name: Mickey & Minnie's Runaway Railway
theme: A trackless dark ride through a cartoon world where guests join Mickey and Minnie on a wild train adventure.
short_description: A modern trackless dark ride featuring Mickey and Minnie in a zany cartoon adventure.

name: The Many Adventures of Winnie the Pooh
theme: A gentle dark ride through the Hundred Acre Wood with Winnie the Pooh and friends.
short_description: A charming dark ride featuring beloved characters from the Winnie the Pooh stories.

name: Davy Crockett Explorer Canoes
theme: Paddle a real canoe around the Rivers of America with your fellow guests providing the power.
short_description: A unique guest-powered canoe experience around the Rivers of America.

name: Wondrous Journeys
theme: A nighttime spectacular celebrating 100 years of Disney animation with projections on Main Street and Sleeping Beauty Castle.
short_description: A dazzling fireworks and projection show celebrating Disney's storytelling legacy.

name: Spaceship Earth
theme: A journey through the history of human communication from cave paintings to the digital age.
short_description: EPCOT's iconic dark ride through a geodesic sphere exploring communication history.

name: Guardians of the Galaxy: Cosmic Rewind
theme: A reverse-launch roller coaster through space with the Guardians, featuring rotating vehicles and classic rock music.
short_description: An innovative indoor coaster with backward launch and rotating ride vehicles set to music.

name: Test Track
theme: Design your own virtual vehicle then test it at high speeds on outdoor tracks.
short_description: A high-speed ride simulating automotive testing with outdoor thrills.

name: Mission: SPACE
theme: A simulated space mission to Mars with intense G-forces and team roles (Orange) or milder Earth orbit (Green).
short_description: An intense space flight simulator offering two intensity levels.

name: Soarin' Around the World
theme: Hang glide over iconic landmarks around the world in a breathtaking flight experience.
short_description: A peaceful flying simulator soaring over global landmarks with stunning visuals.

name: Living with the Land
theme: A boat tour through greenhouses showcasing innovative agricultural techniques and ecosystems.
short_description: An educational boat ride exploring sustainable farming and ecosystems.

name: The Seas with Nemo & Friends
theme: A gentle ride searching for Nemo with projection technology blending animated characters with real fish.
short_description: A family-friendly dark ride combining Finding Nemo with a real aquarium.

name: Turtle Talk with Crush
theme: An interactive conversation with Crush the sea turtle in real time using advanced animation.
short_description: An interactive show where guests chat live with Crush from Finding Nemo.

name: Journey Into Imagination with Figment
theme: A sensory journey through the Imagination Institute with the beloved purple dragon Figment.
short_description: A whimsical dark ride featuring Figment exploring the five senses.

name: Frozen Ever After
theme: A boat journey through Arendelle celebrating a winter festival with Anna, Elsa, and friends.
short_description: A charming boat ride through the world of Frozen with beloved characters.

name: Remy's Ratatouille Adventure
theme: Shrink to rat size and scurry through Gusteau's restaurant in this trackless 3D adventure with Remy.
short_description: A trackless dark ride through a Parisian restaurant from a rat's perspective.

name: Gran Fiesta Tour Starring The Three Caballeros
theme: A gentle boat ride through Mexico following Donald Duck and the Three Caballeros.
short_description: A relaxing boat journey through Mexican culture with animated characters.

name: The American Adventure
theme: An Audio-Animatronic show celebrating American history, culture, and innovation.
short_description: A patriotic theatrical presentation of American history with advanced animatronics.

name: Impressions de France
theme: A widescreen film showcasing the beauty, culture, and landscapes of France.
short_description: A sweeping cinematic tour of France's iconic locations and culture.

name: Beauty and the Beast Sing-Along
theme: An interactive sing-along retelling of Beauty and the Beast hosted by Angela Lansbury as Mrs. Potts.
short_description: A theatrical sing-along celebrating Beauty and the Beast with audience participation.

name: Reflections of China
theme: A Circle-Vision 360° film exploring China's landscapes, cities, and cultural heritage.
short_description: An immersive 360-degree film journey through modern and ancient China.

name: Canada Far and Wide in Circle-Vision 360
theme: A Circle-Vision 360° film showcasing Canada's diverse landscapes and cultural spirit.
short_description: An immersive 360-degree cinematic tour of Canada's natural beauty.

name: Awesome Planet
theme: A short film celebrating the beauty and diversity of Earth's natural wonders.
short_description: An inspiring film about Earth's environments and conservation.

name: Luminous The Symphony of Us
theme: A nighttime spectacular on World Showcase Lagoon celebrating Disney music and global cultures with water, lights, and fireworks.
short_description: EPCOT's current nighttime show featuring fountains, lasers, and Disney songs.

name: Club Cool
theme: Sample complimentary Coca-Cola beverages from around the world in this refreshing lounge.
short_description: A free tasting experience featuring international Coca-Cola flavors.

name: Journey of Water, Inspired by Moana
theme: An interactive outdoor walkthrough exploring the water cycle inspired by Disney's Moana.
short_description: A hands-on exploration of water and nature with Moana theming.

name: Star Wars: Rise of the Resistance
theme: An epic multi-stage adventure where guests join the Resistance in a battle against the First Order with multiple ride systems.
short_description: A groundbreaking attraction blending multiple ride systems in an immersive Star Wars story.

name: Millennium Falcon: Smugglers Run
theme: Pilot the legendary Millennium Falcon on a smuggling mission with interactive flight controls.
short_description: An interactive flight simulator where guests pilot the Millennium Falcon.

name: The Twilight Zone Tower of Terror
theme: A haunted hotel elevator that drops guests through the Twilight Zone with randomized drop sequences.
short_description: An iconic drop tower attraction set in a haunted 1930s Hollywood hotel.

name: Rock 'n' Roller Coaster Starring Aerosmith
theme: A high-speed launched indoor coaster through Los Angeles at night with Aerosmith's music.
short_description: An intense launched roller coaster with inversions and rock music.

name: Slinky Dog Dash
theme: A family coaster aboard Slinky Dog racing through Andy's backyard with gentle thrills.
short_description: A family-friendly outdoor coaster themed to Slinky Dog from Toy Story.

name: Toy Story Mania!
theme: Play carnival games hosted by Toy Story characters using 3D glasses and spring-action shooters.
short_description: An interactive 4D carnival game dark ride with Woody, Buzz, and friends.

name: Alien Swirling Saucers
theme: Spin and whirl aboard flying saucers piloted by the Aliens from Toy Story.
short_description: A spinning flat ride themed to the Pizza Planet Aliens.

name: Mickey & Minnie's Runaway Railway
theme: A trackless dark ride through a cartoon world where guests join Mickey and Minnie on a wild train adventure.
short_description: A modern trackless dark ride featuring Mickey and Minnie in a zany cartoon adventure.

name: Star Tours – The Adventures Continue
theme: A 3D motion simulator flight through the Star Wars galaxy with randomized destinations.
short_description: A thrilling Star Wars flight simulator with multiple story variations.

name: Muppet*Vision 3D
theme: A 3D film featuring the Muppets with in-theater effects and classic Muppet humor.
short_description: A hilarious 3D movie experience with Kermit, Miss Piggy, and the Muppets.

name: Nemo & Friends SeaRider
theme: Shrink down to fish size and join Nemo, Dory, and friends on an underwater adventure.
short_description: A motion simulator ride through the Finding Nemo underwater world.

name: Aquatopia
theme: Ride unpredictable trackless vehicles that spin and zip across a lagoon avoiding water jets.
short_description: A unique trackless water ride with vehicles that move independently.

name: Soaring: Fantastic Flight
theme: Fly through fantastical realms inspired by world myths and legends in this breathtaking simulator.
short_description: An exclusive flying simulator experience unique to Tokyo DisneySea.

name: Venetian Gondolas
theme: Glide through the romantic canals of a Venetian-inspired harbor in an authentic gondola.
short_description: A peaceful gondola ride through picturesque Mediterranean-style canals.

name: DisneySea Transit Steamer Line
theme: Cruise around Tokyo DisneySea on a classic steamship with scenic views of themed ports.
short_description: A transportation and sightseeing boat touring the park's waterways.

name: DisneySea Electric Railway
theme: Board an early 20th-century electric trolley traveling between American Waterfront and Port Discovery.
short_description: A vintage electric railway providing scenic transportation across the park.

name: Fortress Explorations
theme: Explore a massive Renaissance fortress filled with interactive exhibits about navigation, astronomy, and alchemy.
short_description: An elaborate walk-through fortress with hands-on scientific exhibits.

name: Turtle Talk
theme: Have a real-time conversation with Crush the sea turtle from Finding Nemo.
short_description: An interactive show where guests chat with Crush using real-time animation.

name: Big Band Beat
theme: A spectacular live jazz concert featuring Mickey and friends with a full big band orchestra.
short_description: A Broadway-caliber stage show with live music and Disney characters.

name: The Magic Lamp Theater
theme: A 3D show starring the Genie from Aladdin with live magic acts and special effects.
short_description: A 3D film and live performance combining magic and comedy with the Genie.

name: Caravan Carousel
theme: A double-decker Arabian-themed carousel with exotic animals and ornate decorations.
short_description: An elaborate two-story carousel featuring genies and Arabian animals.

name: Jasmine's Flying Carpets
theme: Soar on magic carpets around a genie's lamp with control over your flight height.
short_description: A spinning ride on flying carpets themed to Aladdin.

name: Scuttle's Scooters
theme: Zip around in hermit crab shells guided by Scuttle the seagull.
short_description: A gentle spinning ride for younger guests themed to The Little Mermaid.

name: Flounder's Flying Fish Coaster
theme: A family-friendly roller coaster through an underwater kelp forest with Flounder.
short_description: A gentle junior coaster perfect for first-time riders.

name: Jumpin' Jellyfish
theme: Bounce gently up and down under colorful jellyfish umbrellas.
short_description: A kid-friendly tower ride with gentle drops.

name: Blowfish Balloon Race
theme: Spin around in colorful blowfish balloons above Ariel's world.
short_description: A gentle spinning ride themed to pufferfish for young children.

name: Ariel's Playground
theme: An elaborate multi-level playground inside Prince Eric's ship with slides and interactive elements.
short_description: An indoor play area for children themed to The Little Mermaid.

name: Mermaid Lagoon Theater
theme: A theatrical production of The Little Mermaid with puppetry, acrobatics, and aerial performances.
short_description: A spectacular stage show retelling Ariel's story with stunning effects.

name: Believe! Sea of Dreams
theme: A breathtaking nighttime spectacular on the water with fountains, projections, lasers, and fireworks.
short_description: DisneySea's signature nighttime harbor show with pyrotechnics and water effects.

name: Disney Light the Night
theme: A special nighttime projection and lighting spectacular celebrating Disney stories.
short_description: A seasonal nighttime show featuring projections and special effects.

name: Frozen Kingdom (Fantasy Springs)
theme: Journey through Arendelle visiting Elsa's ice palace and experiencing Frozen's iconic moments.
short_description: A boat ride through the world of Frozen in the new Fantasy Springs expansion.

name: Rapunzel's Lantern Festival (Fantasy Springs)
theme: Experience Rapunzel's dream of seeing the floating lanterns in this enchanting boat journey.
short_description: A romantic boat ride through Tangled's most magical moments.

name: Peter Pan's Never Land Adventure (Fantasy Springs)
theme: Help Peter Pan battle Captain Hook in this thrilling trackless dark ride adventure through Neverland.
short_description: A cutting-edge trackless dark ride featuring Peter Pan and advanced effects.
